subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hogue, a star center on Cincinnati’s back-to-back national championship basketball teams, helped lead the Bearcats to N.C.A.A. championships in 1961 and 1962.
snippet: Mr. Hogue, a star center on Cincinnati’s back-to-back national championship basketball teams, helped lead the Bearcats to N.C.A.A. championships in 1961 and 1962.
